page.title: 03Land-use
page.content: Land-use {Farming}There are several farms in this area farming maining grain crops,sheep and bullocks.There are also hop gardens and a market garden.Crops are rotated and animals bedded on hay and straw. {Housing}There are three council-owned estates,the rest of the housing being mainly owner-occupied.There are few properties to rent.There are as many old houses as new ones. { Industry}There are two main industries.One is the animal feed mill and the other is the famous cricket bat factory. { Social}The community assocciation has bought a piece of land in order tobuild a centre.They are trying to raise money to do this.The present Hall is old and too small.
